summary: Feature request to prevent application code from modifying built-in query handlers that start with `__temporal` prefix, ensuring that core functionality like the Temporal UI continues to work correctly.
userImpact: Users could accidentally override critical built-in query handlers, breaking Temporal UI and other core functionality.
proposedFix: Disable changes to handlers with names starting by `__temporal` and other well-known built-in names.
resolutionDetails: Built-in query handlers are now protected from being overridden by application code.
keyQuote: Built-in query handlers should not be modified by application code to ensure that, e.g., the temporal UI still works.
